title: Add faint logo background to About section

requirements.text: Add the uploaded image "BMLOGO-1.jpg" as a faint (low-opacity) background behind the "About BM ENTERPRISES" section on the Trusted Electrical Contractors landing page (frontend/src/pages/TrustedElectricalContractorsPage.tsx), without reducing text readability.

quotes: add this picture in faint :On Background                   About BM ENTERPRISES

acceptanceCriteria: The "About BM ENTERPRISES" section on the Trusted Electrical Contractors page displays BMLOGO-1.jpg as a background image with low opacity (faint effect).
The background image is positioned behind the section content (does not shift layout or overlap text/buttons).
Text in the section remains clearly readable on all screen sizes (desktop and mobile).
The background image is loaded as a static frontend asset (not routed through the backend).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components are read-only).
Keep all changes within the existing React + Tailwind CSS patterns used in the project.
nonGoals: Do not change the existing header logo or footer logo behavior.
Do not apply the faint background logo to other pages/sections unless explicitly requested.
